BI-item-description.fertilizer: Common fertilizer lets stuff grow faster and is also used to produce Algae biomass.

item-description.bi-adv-fertilizer: __ITEM__bi-adv-fertilizer__ — the special ingredient that turns a greatly improved into a super production. Available only to users of Bio Industries! :-)
item-description.fertilizer: __ITEM__fertilizer__ lets stuff grow faster and is also used to produce Algae biomass.
item-description.bi-bio-cannon-basic-ammo: Rocket powered, low physical damage (fired by prototype artillery)
item-description.bi-bio-cannon-biological-ammo: Rocket powered, high biological damage (fired by prototype artillery)
item-description.bi-bio-cannon-poison-ammo: Rocket powered, medium poison damage (fired by prototype artillery)
item-description.bi-bio-cannon-proto-ammo: Propelled by TNT, low physical damage (fired by prototype artillery)
item-description.bi-dart-rifle: This cheap weapon uses easily producible ammo and is good for fending off weaker enemies.
item-description.bi-cellulose: __ITEM__battery__, __ITEM__plastic-bar__, Sulfuric acid — all of these can be made with __ITEM__bi-cellulose__!
item-description.bi-woodpulp: __ITEM__bi-woodpulp__ can be used for many purposes. When burned, it will pollute less than raw __ITEM__wood__, but it will only give you half the energy.
item-description.pellet-coke: More energy than __ITEM__solid-fuel__ with only about 60% the emissions, plus a little boost to the top speed – why don't you fuel your trains with __ITEM__pellet-coke__ already?!
item-description.resin: __ITEM__resin__ is a sticky substance that can be processed to get Petroleum gas!
item-description.solid-fuel: __ITEM__solid-fuel__ provides less energy than __ITEM__wood-bricks__, but also burns with less pollution. Additionally, it will make your vehicles drive and accelerate faster.
item-description.stone-crushed: __ITEM__stone-crushed__ is mainly used for building rails and roads.
item-description.wood-bricks: Compressed __ITEM__bi-woodpulp__ provides a lot of energy while polluting less. It's an early substitute for __ITEM__solid-fuel__.
item-description.wood-charcoal: Provides more energy than __ITEM__coal__ while emitting far less pollution. Unfortunately, it's not as versatilely usable, so you will still need __ITEM__coal__!
item-description.wood: Base your energy production on this renewable resource!\nPlease note: There's a lot more you can use it for than just burning it!
